title: Did Razer Just Make the Perfect Mouse?

media:group.media:title: Did Razer Just Make the Perfect Mouse?
media:group.media:description:
Sponsored by @Opera GX - Download it for free at https://operagx.gg/TheScoreEsports2

Razer are responsible for creating what many consider to be the first ever gaming mouse.

They’ve manufactured gaming peripherals longer than just about anyone else, and have produced some of the most popular products in the entire world. But none of their creations are quite as iconic as the DeathAdder.

For years, the DeathAdder has been one of the most popular head clickers in esports. From League of Legends to Valorant, pros have made history with this mouse in their hands.

Razer has released several new and upgraded DeathAdders over the years - and it all culminated in this: The DeathAdder V3 Pro. Razer claim it’s lighter, more ergonomic and better than ever before.

But is this new DeathAdder really worth the hype?

Written by: Niall McCrossan (@niallmccrossan)
